I would imagine it's definitely flammable.  Most marker ink is alcohol soluble, and also soluble in other volatile (and almost always flammable) solvents.  That's literally how they work; the ink is dissolved in some volatile solvent, and when you put that on a surface in a thin layer, the solvent rapidly evaporates leaving the pigment itself behind.
